summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4890 for the improvement of portion of the alley in Block 6, Hunter's Lake Union Addition, being the alley between McGraw Street and Wheeler Street, from Bigelow Avenue to a point approximately 180 feet east of Bigelow Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56072, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
